word:
God Calls You 

     Let every sister who claims to be a child of God, feel a responsibility to help all within her reach. The noblest of 
                                                                           15
all attainments may be gained through practical self-denial and benevolence, for others' good. Sisters, God calls you to work in the harvest field, and to help gather in the sheaves. R. & H. Dec. 10, 1914.
